con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="X-App-Platform" value="android"/> <con:entry key="X-App-Version" value="1.0"/> <con:entry key="Accept-Language" value="en"/> <con:entry key="X-App-Platform-Version" value="4.4.2"/> <con:entry key="applicationType" value="web"/> </xml-fragment>

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.getResponseContent()
log.info responseContent
def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText responseContent
assert json.status==true assert json.data.totalResultCount==12

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.getResponseContent()
log.info responseContent
def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText responseContent
assert json.status==true assert json.data.isDoTripRecommended==true assert json.data.isFavorite==true

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.getResponseContent()
log.info responseContent
def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText responseContent
assert json.status==true assert json.data.averageRating==4 assert json.data.experienceId=="aevoevnienvebd"
